On this page

# Type alias: Mutable\<T\>

> **Mutable**\<`T`\>: `{ -readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P] }`

Removes \"readonly\" from all properties

## Type parameters[​](Mutable.html#type-parameters "Direct link to Type parameters"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Type parameters"} {#type-parameters .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

• **T**
